name: Storybook Upin & Ipin
description:
Come and take a journey with Upin & Ipin. One of the most beloved twins in Malaysian television now comes to life in storybook form. Our aim is to encourage reading as we believe it can take you to a magical place of imagination and excitement.

Upin & Ipin Storybook features:
- Beautiful illustrations that everyone can enjoy.
- Animated pages to bring storytelling to life.
- An interactive game for added fun.
- Available in two languages; English and Bahasa Malaysia to help young readers to learn or improve their reading knowledge.

First Book: 'The Rain and the Seven Seas Part 1'
